title: A Web of Evil
description: When Michelle Iverson disappears after posting a provocative message on a BDSM Internet bulletin board, her father hires Mason Grant to find her. Mason teams up with the missing woman's stepsister, Tracy, and the pair delves into the dark side of cyber space, seeking clues to Michelle's disappearance. The journey leads Mason and Tracy down several false trails, into a love affair, and finally to a confrontation with a sadistic abductor. Masonâ€™s search leads to a shocking revelation, which turns his world on end.
author: Richard McMahon
